data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Scotland, United Kingdom.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Scotland, United Kingdom
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 410,069 believers in Scotland to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Scotland, United Kingdom with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Scotland, United Kingdom.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Arab, Iraqi people.
Father, please raise up prophets in Scotland who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Scotland, United Kingdom. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Scotland, United Kingdom.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
